trans-unit.source: Azure Linux VM Extension Configuration Samples.
trans-unit.target: Azure Linux VM Extension Configuration Samples.

trans-unit.source: This article provides sample configuration for configuring Azure VM Extensions for Azure IaaS Linux VMs.
trans-unit.target: This article provides sample configuration for configuring Azure VM Extensions for Azure IaaS Linux VMs.

trans-unit.source: To learn more about these extensions click here.
trans-unit.target: To learn more about these extensions click here.

trans-unit.source: Sample template snippet for VM Extensions.
trans-unit.target: Sample template snippet for VM Extensions.

trans-unit.source: The template snippet for Deploying extensions looks as following:
trans-unit.target: The template snippet for Deploying extensions looks as following:

trans-unit.source: Before deploying the extension please check the latest extension version and replace the "typeHandlerVersion" with the current latest version.
trans-unit.target: Before deploying the extension please check the latest extension version and replace the "typeHandlerVersion" with the current latest version.

trans-unit.source: Rest of the article provides sample configurations for Linux VM Extensions.
trans-unit.target: Rest of the article provides sample configurations for Linux VM Extensions.
